articles.title: Pushpa 2 Vs Singham Again: Ajay Devgn annoyed with Allu Arjun? Plans to postpone cop drama? - Bollywood Life
articles.description: Ajay Devgn had booked the I-Day weekend three months ago and he is how furious on this invasion. Feels Pushpa should have followed rules.
articles.content:
Ajay Devgns Singham Again was already slated to release on August 15, 2024. It was supposed to be a solo release but now, things have changed.
